thread.title: BRIEF-Shrotriya May Sell Up To 1 Mln Shares Of Spectrum Pharmaceuticals' Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Shrotriya May Sell Up To 1 Mln Shares Of Spectrum Pharmaceuticals' Common Stock

organizations.name: ectrum pharmaceuticals' common stock reuters staff

text: March 27, 2018 / 10:24 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Shrotriya May Sell Up To 1 Mln Shares Of Spectrum Pharmaceuticals' Common Stock Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Spectrum Pharmaceuticals Inc: * RAJESH C. SHROTRIYA - SHROTRIYA MAY SELL UP TO 1 MILLION SHARES OF SPECTRUM PHARMACEUTICALS' COMMON STOCK BETWEEN MARCH 26 AND JUNE 29 - SEC FILING‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2pKokJc ) Further company coverage:
